subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Shane Battier, the Miami Heat forward who dove all over the floor against the Knicks on Wednesday, has brought defense and intelligence to the pursuit of his first N.B.A. championship.
snippet: Shane Battier, the Miami Heat forward who dove all over the floor against the Knicks on Wednesday, has brought defense and intelligence to the pursuit of his first N.B.A. championship.
